column2: It should,  however be  real  and  tangible,  that is,  there should be effective  occupation

column1: Thus  in  light  of  the  above
column2: the  learned  High  Court  Judge  was  in  error  when  he
misdirected himself on the facts and law and made order directing the handing over of

column1: the temple back to the Respondents.  In the circumstances I set aside the order of the
learned High Court Judge dated 14.10.2003 and allow the appeal with costs.
